title: The Basilisk Conspiracy: A futuristic fiction or is it
description: The world is in chaos. Wars, economic crises, drought, famine, what is there to do? Behind it all, out of sight of the Elitists who control banking, economics, a group of well-intentioned brilliant minds representing a new world order is quietly putting in place a system that will change everything. All over the world, people are begging to be included in this remarkable method of dealing with all the issues of living. A simple micro-chip is injected in the back of the right hand of everyone. That solves all the problems in the world. In this riveting story lies the apparent solution to medical record retrieval, credit card fraud, even passport identification. This device would allow individuals to be located on the vast network of global internet services. A must read for those interested in geo-technology and issues of one world government.
author: Louis H. Campbell
